com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin

Interface GeneiousServiceListener


  • public interface GeneiousServiceListener
    Callback used in GeneiousService::initialize to enable a service to report the addition & removal of sub/child-services, and report back a change of status or name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void childServiceAdded(GeneiousService service)
      Called to install a new sub/child service.
      void childServiceRemoved(GeneiousService service)
      Called to remove a previously installed sub/child service.
      void iconsChanged()
      Called when service icons (GeneiousService.getIcons()) changed.
      void nameChanged()
      Called when service name (GeneiousService.getName()) has changed.
      void serviceTreeLabelChanged()
      Called when service tree label (GeneiousService.getName()) has changed.
      void setMessage(String message)
      Set a message which will be display immediately in the status bar if the service is selected.
      void statusChanged(GeneiousService.ServiceStatus newStatus)
      Called when service status changes (when service becomes unavailable/available/busy).

    • Method Detail

      • statusChanged

        void statusChanged(GeneiousService.ServiceStatus newStatus)
        Called when service status changes (when service becomes unavailable/available/busy). The service status is GeneiousService.ServiceStatus.AVAILABLE by default.
        Parameters:
        newStatus - the new status.

      • nameChanged

        void nameChanged()
        Called when service name (GeneiousService.getName()) has changed.

      • serviceTreeLabelChanged

        void serviceTreeLabelChanged()
        Called when service tree label (GeneiousService.getName()) has changed. This is similar to nameChanged() but has a much smaller impact on performance as it does not cause alphabetical re-ordering of the service tree entries so it is suitable for cases where the service tree label changes rapidly such as in the local database when new documents are being added.

      • iconsChanged

        void iconsChanged()
        Called when service icons (GeneiousService.getIcons()) changed.

      • childServiceAdded

        void childServiceAdded(GeneiousService service)
        Called to install a new sub/child service.
        Parameters:
        service - to add

      • setMessage

        void setMessage(String message)
        Set a message which will be display immediately in the status bar if the service is selected. Should be set back to null or empty String when the message is to be displayed no longer.
        Parameters:
        message - to dislay

      • childServiceRemoved

        void childServiceRemoved(GeneiousService service)
        Called to remove a previously installed sub/child service.
        Parameters:
        service - to remove
